scripts.start: npm run build:tailwind && npm run elm-graphql && elm-pages dev --port 1234
scripts.elm-graphql: PATH=$(npm bin):$PATH elm-graphql https://oqagd84p.api.sanity.io/v1/graphql/production/default --skip-elm-format --output elm-graphql-gen/ --base SanityApi --scalar-codecs Scalar && elm-graphql https://ellie-app.com/api --base EllieApi --output elm-graphql-gen/ --skip-elm-format
scripts.build: npm run elm-graphql && npm run build:hls-video && elm-pages build --keep-cache
scripts.build:hls-video: (cd hls-video-element && npm i && npm run build) && cp hls-video-element/dist/hls-video-element.js public/
